searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT B.PKID, B.STATUS AS STATUS_OLD, B.RED_COUNT, B.PROPERTY_ADDR, (CASE B.LOAN_REQ WHEN '0' THEN '否' WHEN '1' THEN '是' ELSE '' END) LOAN_REQ, B.CASE_CODE, B.CTM_CODE, B.AGENT_NAME , B.AGENT_PHONE , B.AGENT_CODE, B.GRP_CODE as AGENT_ORG_CODE, u1.REAL_NAME+(case when ttp.TEAM_PROPERTY='yu_back' then'(后台组)' when ttp.TEAM_PROPERTY='yu_all' then '(全流程组)' when ttp.TEAM_PROPERTY='yu_front' then '(前台组)' end) as OP_NAME, org1.ORG_NAME as OP_ORG, B.LEADING_PROCESS_ID as OP_ID, B.ORG_ID OP_ORG_ID, B.CREATE_TIME, B.RES_DATE, B.CASE_PROPERTY AS CASE_PROPERTY_OLD, B.CLOSE_TIME, E.MORT_TYPE, E.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT, E.COM_AMOUNT, E.PRF_AMOUNT, E.LOANER_NAME, (CASE E.IS_LOANER_ARRIVE WHEN '0' THEN '否' WHEN '1' THEN '是' ELSE '' END) IS_LOANER_ARRIVE, (CASE firstFollow.IS_PERCHASE_RESERACH_NEED WHEN '0' THEN '否' WHEN '1' THEN '是' ELSE '' END) IS_PERCHASE_RESERACH_NEED, E.COM_DISCOUNT, E.SIGN_DATE, E.APPR_DATE, E.LEND_DATE, E.CUST_NAME, --主贷人 E.CUST_PHONE, --主贷人电话 E.EVA_ORG_CODE, E.BANK_CODE, E.SPV_TYPE AS SPV_TYPE_OLD, E.AMOUNT, E.SIGN_TIME, E.CON_PRICE, E.REAL_PRICE, E.REAL_CON_TIME, E.TAX_TIME, E.PRICING_TIME, E.REAL_PLS_TIME, E.REAL_HT_TIME, E.CREATE_TIME AS GUOHU_CREATE_TIME, E.COMMENT AS GUOHU_COMMENT, E.REAL_PROPERTY_GET_TIME, E.LOAN_LOST_TYPE, E.REC_LETTER_NO, E.SELF_DEL_REASON, E.loanlost_apply_reason, E.LOANLOST_CONFIRM_CODE, AC.org_name AS AGENT_ORG,
(SELECT TOP 1 HOUSE_HODING_TAX FROM sctrans.T_TO_TAX TAX with(nolock) WHERE TAX.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND TAX.IS_ACTIVE = 1) AS TAX_HOUSE_HODING_TAX, (SELECT TOP 1 PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX FROM sctrans.T_TO_TAX TAX with(nolock) WHERE TAX.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND TAX.IS_ACTIVE = 1) AS TAX_PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX, (SELECT TOP 1 BUSINESS_TAX FROM sctrans.T_TO_TAX TAX with(nolock) WHERE TAX.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND TAX.IS_ACTIVE = 1) AS TAX_BUSINESS_TAX, (SELECT TOP 1 CONTRACT_TAX FROM sctrans.T_TO_TAX TAX with(nolock) WHERE TAX.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND TAX.IS_ACTIVE = 1) AS TAX_CONTRACT_TAX , (SELECT TOP 1 LAND_INCREMENT_TAX FROM sctrans.T_TO_TAX TAX with(nolock) WHERE TAX.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND TAX.IS_ACTIVE = 1) AS TAX_LAND_INCREMENT_TAX,
(SELECT TOP 1 HOUSE_HODING_TAX FROM sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER TAX with(nolock) WHERE TAX.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND TAX.IS_ACTIVE = 1) AS TRANSFER_HOUSE_HODING_TAX, (SELECT TOP 1 PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX FROM sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER TAX with(nolock) WHERE TAX.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND TAX.IS_ACTIVE = 1) AS TRANSFER_PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX, (SELECT TOP 1 BUSINESS_TAX FROM sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER TAX with(nolock) WHERE TAX.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND TAX.IS_ACTIVE = 1) AS TRANSFER_BUSINESS_TAX, (SELECT TOP 1 CONTRACT_TAX FROM sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER TAX with(nolock) WHERE TAX.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND TAX.IS_ACTIVE = 1) AS TRANSFER_CONTRACT_TAX , (SELECT TOP 1 LAND_INCREMENT_TAX FROM sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER TAX with(nolock) WHERE TAX.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND TAX.IS_ACTIVE = 1) AS TRANSFER_LAND_INCREMENT_TAX,
AE.JFHJL_MGR AS AGENT_FHJL, AE.JQYJL_MGR AS AGENT_QYJL, AE.JQYZJ_MGR AS AGENT_QYZJ, AE.JQYDS_MGR AS AGENT_QYDS, AE.JFHJL_MGR_CODE, AE.JQYJL_MGR_CODE, AE.JQYZJ_MGR_CODE, AE.JQYDS_MGR_CODE, BBA.ORG_NAME AS AGENT_QDORG, tp.TAX_PRICING as CHECK_PRICE, (CASE WHEN tpi.[SQUARE] = 0 THEN NULL ELSE CAST (tp.TAX_PRICING/tpi.[SQUARE] AS decimal (18,2)) END) as UNIT_PRICE, stuff((select '/'+tt1.REAL_NAME from( SELECT u.real_name+(case when ttp.TEAM_PROPERTY='yu_back' then'(后台组)' when ttp.TEAM_PROPERTY='yu_all' then '(全流程组)' when ttp.TEAM_PROPERTY='yu_front' then '(前台组)' end) as REAL_NAME,c.case_code FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE c inner join sctrans.sys_user u on c.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = u.id left join sctrans.sys_org o on o.id=c.org_id left join sctrans.T_TS_TEAM_PROPERTY ttp on o.org_code= ttp.yu_team_code UNION SELECT u.real_name+(case when ttp.TEAM_PROPERTY='yu_back' then'(后台组)' when ttp.TEAM_PROPERTY='yu_all' then '(全流程组)' when ttp.TEAM_PROPERTY='yu_front' then '(前台组)' end) as REAL_NAME,p.case_code FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR p inner join sctrans.sys_user u on p.PROCESSOR_ID = u.id AND P.SRV_CODE IN ('3000400201','3000401002') left join sctrans.sys_org o on o.id=p.org_id left join sctrans.T_TS_TEAM_PROPERTY ttp on o.org_code= ttp.yu_team_code )as tt1 where tt1.case_code=e.case_code FOR xml path('')) ,1,1,'') as PROCESSOR_ID,
(SELECT STUFF((SELECT '/'+T.ORG_NAME FROM( SELECT O.ORG_NAME,P.CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR P with(nolock) INNER JOIN sctrans.SYS_USER U with(nolock) ON P.PROCESSOR_ID = U.ID AND P.SRV_CODE IN ('3000400201','3000401002') LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_ORG O with(nolock) ON O.ID = P.ORG_ID )T WHERE T.CASE_CODE = E.CASE_CODE FOR xml path('')),1,1,'')) PROCESSOR_ORG_NAME,
stuff(( select '/'+GUEST_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = e.CASE_CODE AND TRANS_POSITION = '30006001' ORDER BY PKID FOR xml path('')) ,1,1,'') as SELLER, stuff(( select '/'+GUEST_PHONE FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = e.CASE_CODE AND TRANS_POSITION = '30006001' ORDER BY PKID FOR xml path('')) ,1,1,'') as SELLER_PHONE,
stuff(( select '/'+GUEST_NAME FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = e.CASE_CODE AND TRANS_POSITION = '30006002' ORDER BY PKID FOR xml path('')) ,1,1,'') as BUYER, stuff(( select '/'+GUEST_PHONE FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = e.CASE_CODE AND TRANS_POSITION = '30006002' ORDER BY PKID FOR xml path('')) ,1,1,'') as BUYER_PHONE, stuff(( select distinct'/'+ d.name FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR left join sctrans.sys_dict d on d.type='yu_serv_cat_code_tree' and d.code=SRV_CODE where CASE_CODE = e.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CODE IN ('3000400201','3000401002') FOR xml path('')) ,1,1,'') as SRV_STR, orgd.ORG_NAME as OP_PARENT_ORG, guser.real_name as GUOHU_APPROVER, t.end_time_ as GUOHU_APPROVER_TIME FROM sctrans.V_CASE_LIST_BASE B INNER JOIN [sctrans].[V_CASE_LIST_EXCEL] E ON B.CASE_CODE = E.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.v_user_job_org_main AS AC on AC.user_id = B.AGENT_CODE <!-- AND AC.job_code = 'JWYGW' --> LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_SYS_ORG_HIERARCHY AS AE on AE.GROUP_ID = AC.ORG_id LEFT JOIN SCTRANS.SYS_ORG AS BBA ON AE.BUSIWZ_ID=BBA.ID left join sctrans.sys_user as u1 on u1.id=b.LEADING_PROCESS_ID left join sctrans.sys_org org1 on org1.id=b.ORG_ID left join sctrans.T_TS_TEAM_PROPERTY as ttp on org1.org_code = ttp.yu_team_code left join sctrans.T_TO_PRICING as tp on tp.case_code=e.case_code left join sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO as tpi on tpi.case_code=e.case_code left join sctrans.t_yucui_org_hierarchy yoh on yoh.org_id=b.ORG_ID left join sctrans.SYS_ORG orgd on orgd.id= yoh.DISTRICT_ID left join sctrans.T_TO_FIRST_FOLLOW firstFollow on firstFollow.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE
LEFT JOIN sctrans.t_HI_workflow w ON B.CASE_CODE = w.CASE_CODE AND w.BUSINESS_KEY = 'operation_process' AND w.STATUS IN ('0', '4') AND w.PKID = (select max(PKID) from sctrans.t_HI_workflow WHERE CASE_CODE = w.CASE_CODE AND BUSINESS_KEY = 'operation_process' AND STATUS IN ('0', '4')) LEFT JOIN sctrans.act_hi_varinst v ON v.PROC_INST_ID_ = w.INST_CODE AND v.name_ = 'GuohuApprove' AND v.long_ = 1 LEFT JOIN ( select * from ( select proc_inst_id_,assignee_,end_time_,row_number() over(partition by proc_inst_id_ order by end_time_ desc) rn from sctrans.act_hi_taskinst WHERE task_def_key_ = 'GuohuApprove' ) taskInst where taskInst.rn <=1 ) t ON t.proc_inst_id_ = w.inst_code left join sctrans.sys_user guser on guser.username = t.ASSIGNEE_ and guser.available = '1' and guser.is_deleted = '0'
<ifNotNull realConTime> INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_SIGN AS G ON B.CASE_CODE = G.CASE_CODE </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull realConTimeStart> AND G.REAL_CON_TIME >= #realConTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull realConTimeEnd> AND G.REAL_CON_TIME <= #realConTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull realHtTime> INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER AS H ON B.CASE_CODE = H.CASE_CODE </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull realHtTimeStart> AND H.REAL_HT_TIME >= #realHtTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull realHtTimeEnd> AND H.REAL_HT_TIME < =#realHtTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull realPropertyGetTime> INNER JOIN sctrans.T_TO_GET_PROPERTY_BOOK AS I ON B.CASE_CODE = I.CASE_CODE </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull realPropertyGetTimeStart> AND I.REAL_PROPERTY_GET_TIME >= #realPropertyGetTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull realPropertyGetTimeEnd> AND I.REAL_PROPERTY_GET_TIME <= #realPropertyGetTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
where ( EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull idflag> and C.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #userId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND C.ORG_ID in (#queryorgs#) </ifNotNull>) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull idflag> and C.PROCESSOR_ID = #userId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND C.ORG_ID in (#queryorgs#) </ifNotNull>) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR A INNER JOIN ( SELECT T.*,S.id FROM SCTRANS.T_TL_TASK_REASSIGNT_LOG T LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_USER S ON t.ORI_ASSIGNEE = S.username ) L ON L.id = A.PROCESSOR_ID and L.case_code = A.case_code <ifNotNull userLoginName> AND L.NEW_ASSIGNEE = #userLoginName#</ifNotNull> WHERE B.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND A.SRV_CODE IN ( '3000400201', '3000401002' ) ) ) <ifNotNull guestname> AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TG_GUEST_INFO WHERE CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE and GUEST_NAME LIKE '%'+#guestname#+'%' ) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull proName> AND ( EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE c where c.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #proName# and CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR p where p.PROCESSOR_ID = #proName# and CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE) ) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull agentOrgName> AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB uoj where uoj.user_id = B.AGENT_CODE AND uoj.org_id = #agentOrgName# ) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode1> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode1#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode2> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode2#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode3> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode3#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode4> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode4#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode5> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode5#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode6> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode6#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode7> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode7#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode8> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode8#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode9> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode9#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode10> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode10#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode11> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode11#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode12> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode12#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode13> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode13#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode14> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode14#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull srvCode15> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode15#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signlendDate> and exists ( select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE J where B.CASE_CODE = J.CASE_CODE and is_active='1' </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signDateStart> and J.SIGN_DATE >= #signDateStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signDateEnd> and J.SIGN_DATE <= #signDateEnd# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull lendDateStart> and J.LEND_DATE >= #lendDateStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull lendDateEnd> and J.LEND_DATE <= #lendDateEnd# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signlendDate> ) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull isNotResearchCloseCase> and B.CASE_PROPERTY != '30003002' </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull guohuApproveTimeStart> AND t.end_time_ >= #guohuApproveTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull guohuApproveTimeEnd> AND t.end_time_ <= #guohuApproveTimeEnd# </ifNotNull> <choose> <when test ="mortageType==0"> AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE WHERE IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE ) </when> <when test ="mortageType==1"> AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE WHERE MORT_TYPE IN ('30016001','30016002') AND IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 1 AND CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE ) </when> <when test ="mortageType==2"> AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE WHERE MORT_TYPE = '30016003' AND IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 1 AND CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE ) </when> <when test ="mortageType==3"> AND EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE WHERE MORT_TYPE IN ('30016001','30016002') AND IS_ACTIVE = 1 AND IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 0 AND CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE ) </when> </choose>
searchSql.orderBySql: ORDER BY B.STATUS DESC, B.CASE_CODE DESC

searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT B.CASE_CODE, B.CTM_CODE, B.CASE_STATUS, B.CASE_STATUS_CN,--分单 B.CASE_PROPERTY, B.CASE_PROPERTY_CN,--在途等 B.CASE_ORIGIN, B.CASE_CREATE_TIME,
--查询 B.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F, B.CASE_ORG_ID_F, B.CASE_ISSUBSCRIBE, B.CASE_LOAN_REQ, B.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_B, B.GROUP_ORG_ID, --经纪人orgid B.TRANSFER_APP_TIME,
B.CASE_DISPATCH_TIME, B.CASE_REAL_NAME_F, B.CASE_EMPLOYEE_CODE_F, B.CASE_ORG_NAME_F, B.CASE_MANAGER_REAL_NAME, B.CASE_ASSISTANT_REAL_NAME, B.CASE_DISTRICT_NAME, B.CASE_SRV_NAME, B.CASE_SRV_REAL_NAME, B.CASE_SRV_ORG_NAME, B.HOUSR_PROPERTY_ADDR, B.GUEST_NAME_UP, B.GUEST_PHONE_UP, B.GUEST_NAME_DOWN, B.GUEST_PHONE_DOWN, B.BA_NAME,--大区 B.AGENT_NAME, B.AGENT_PHONE, B.AGENT_EMPLOYEE_CODE, B.GRP_NAME, B.JFHJL_NAME, B.JFHJL_EMPLOYEE_CODE, B.JQYJL_NAME, B.JQYJL_EMPLOYEE_CODE, B.JQYZJ_NAME, B.JQYZJ_EMPLOYEE_CODE, B.JQYDS_NAME, B.JQYDS_EMPLOYEE_CODE, B.CASE_EVA_COMPANY, B.MORT_FIN_BRANCH_NAME, B.MORT_FIN_SUB_BRANCH_NAME, B.MORT_SIGN_DATE, B.MORT_APPR_DATE, B.MORT_LEND_DATE, B.MORT_COM_DISCOUNT,--折扣率 B.CASE_LOAN_REQ_CN,--是否贷款 B.MORT_TYPE, B.MORT_TYPE_CN, B.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI_CN, CAST(B.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT / 10000 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) as MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT, CAST(B.MORT_COM_AMOUNT / 10000 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) as MORT_COM_AMOUNT, CAST(B.MORT_PRF_AMOUNT / 10000 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) as MORT_PRF_AMOUNT, B.MORT_LOANER_NAME, B.IS_LOANER_ARRIVE_CN, B.MORT_CUST_NAME, B.MORT_CUST_PHONE, B.LOAN_REC_LETTER_NO, B.LOAN_LOST_CONFIRM_CODE, B.LOAN_SELF_DEL_REASON, B.LOAN_LOST_APPLY_REASON, B.CASE_REAL_CON_TIME, B.CASE_TAX_TIME, B.CASE_PRICING_TIME, B.CASE_REAL_PLS_TIME, B.TRANSFER_REAL_HT_TIME, B.TRANSFER_CREATE_TIME, B.TRANSFER_COMMENT, B.TRANSFER_HOUSE_HODING_TAX, B.TRANSFER_PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX, B.TRANSFER_BUSINESS_TAX, B.TRANSFER_CONTRACT_TAX, B.TRANSFER_LAND_INCREMENT_TAX, B.TAX_HOUSE_HODING_TAX, B.TAX_PERSONAL_INCOME_TAX, B.TAX_BUSINESS_TAX, B.TAX_CONTRACT_TAX, B.TAX_LAND_INCREMENT_TAX,
B.CASE_REAL_PROPERTY_GET_TIME, B.CASE_CLOSE_TIME, CAST(B.CASE_REAL_PRICE / 10000 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) as CASE_REAL_PRICE, CAST(B.CASE_CON_PRICE / 10000 AS DECIMAL(18,2)) as CASE_CON_PRICE, B.CASE_TAX_PRICING, B.CASE_HOUSE_UNIT_PRICE, B.SPV_TYPE_CN, B.SPV_AMOUNT, B.SPV_SIGN_TIME, B.EVA_EVAL_FEE, B.EVA_RECORD_TIME
FROM sctrans.T_RPT_CASE_BASE_INFO B
WHERE 1=1 AND
(EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TO_CASE C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull idflag> and C.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = #userId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND C.ORG_ID in (#queryorgs#) </ifNotNull>) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR C WHERE C.CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull idflag> and C.PROCESSOR_ID = #userId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND C.ORG_ID in (#queryorgs#) </ifNotNull>) OR EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM SCTRANS.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR A INNER JOIN ( SELECT T.*,S.id FROM SCTRANS.T_TL_TASK_REASSIGNT_LOG T LEFT JOIN sctrans.SYS_USER S ON t.ORI_ASSIGNEE = S.username ) L ON L.id = A.PROCESSOR_ID and L.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE <ifNotNull userLoginName> AND L.NEW_ASSIGNEE = #userLoginName#</ifNotNull> WHERE B.CASE_CODE = A.CASE_CODE AND A.SRV_CODE IN ( '3000400201', '3000401002' ) ) )
<if test="isSubscribeFilter != '-1' "> AND B.CASE_ISSUBSCRIBE = #isSubscribeFilter# </if>
<if test="caseOriginType != null and caseOriginType !='' "> AND B.CASE_ORIGIN = #caseOriginType# </if>
<if test="caseProperty != null and caseProperty !='' "> AND B.CASE_PROPERTY = #caseProperty# </if>
<if test="status != null and status !='' "> AND B.CASE_STATUS = #status# </if>
<if test="caseCode != null and caseCode !='' "> AND B.CASE_CODE = #caseCode# </if> <if test="ctmCode != null and ctmCode !='' "> AND B.CTM_CODE = #ctmCode# </if>
<if test="propertyAddr != null and propertyAddr !='' "> AND B.HOUSR_PROPERTY_ADDR LIKE '%'+#propertyAddr#+'%' </if>
<if test="guestname != null and guestname !='' "> AND (B.GUEST_NAME_UP LIKE '%'+#guestname#+'%' OR B.GUEST_NAME_DOWN LIKE '%'+#guestname#+'%') </if>
<if test="proName != null and proName !='' "> AND (B.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F = #proName# OR B.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_B = #proName#) </if>
<if test="agentOrgName != null and agentOrgName !='' "> AND B.GROUP_ORG_ID = #agentOrgName# </if>
<if test="createTimeStart != null and createTimeStart !='' "> AND B.CASE_CREATE_TIME >= #createTimeStart# </if> <if test="createTimeEnd != null and createTimeEnd !='' "> AND B.CASE_CREATE_TIME <= #createTimeEnd# </if>
<if test="resDateStart != null and resDateStart !='' "> AND B.CASE_DISPATCH_TIME >= #resDateStart# </if> <if test="resDateEnd != null and resDateEnd !='' "> AND B.CASE_DISPATCH_TIME <= #resDateEnd# </if>
<if test="realConTimeStart != null and realConTimeStart !='' "> AND B.CASE_REAL_CON_TIME >= #realConTimeStart# </if> <if test="realConTimeEnd != null and realConTimeEnd !='' "> AND B.CASE_REAL_CON_TIME <= #realConTimeEnd# </if>
<if test="realHtTimeStart != null and realHtTimeStart !='' "> AND B.TRANSFER_REAL_HT_TIME >= #realHtTimeStart# </if> <if test="realHtTimeEnd != null and realHtTimeEnd !='' "> AND B.TRANSFER_REAL_HT_TIME <= #realHtTimeEnd# </if>
<if test="realPropertyGetTimeStart != null and realPropertyGetTimeStart !='' "> AND B.CASE_REAL_PROPERTY_GET_TIME >= #realPropertyGetTimeStart# </if> <if test="realPropertyGetTimeEnd != null and realPropertyGetTimeEnd !='' "> AND B.CASE_REAL_PROPERTY_GET_TIME <= #realPropertyGetTimeEnd# </if>
<if test="signDateStart != null and signDateStart !='' "> AND B.MORT_SIGN_DATE >= #signDateStart# </if> <if test="signDateEnd != null and signDateEnd !='' "> AND B.MORT_SIGN_DATE <= #signDateEnd# </if>
<if test="lendDateStart != null and lendDateStart !='' "> AND B.MORT_LEND_DATE >= #lendDateStart# </if> <if test="lendDateEnd != null and lendDateEnd !='' "> AND B.MORT_LEND_DATE <= #lendDateEnd# </if>
<if test="approveTimeStart != null and approveTimeStart !='' "> AND B.CASE_CLOSE_TIME >= #approveTimeStart# </if> <if test="approveTimeEnd != null and approveTimeEnd !='' "> AND B.CASE_CLOSE_TIME <= #approveTimeEnd# </if>
<if test="guohuApproveTimeStart != null and guohuApproveTimeStart !='' "> AND B.TRANSFER_APP_TIME >= #guohuApproveTimeStart# </if> <if test="guohuApproveTimeEnd != null and guohuApproveTimeEnd !='' "> AND B.TRANSFER_APP_TIME <= #guohuApproveTimeEnd# </if>
<if test="isNotResearchCloseCase != null and isNotResearchCloseCase !='' "> AND B.CASE_PROPERTY != '30003002' --结案案件 </if>
<if test="srvCode1 != null and srvCode1 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode1#) </if> <if test="srvCode2 != null and srvCode2 !='' "> AND exists( select 1 from sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode2#) </if> <if test="srvCode3 != null and srvCode3 !='' "> AND sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR where CASE_CODE = B.CASE_CODE AND SRV_CAT = #srvCode15#) </if>
<choose> <when test ="mortageType==0"> AND B.CASE_LOAN_REQ = '0' </when> <when test ="mortageType==1"> AND B.CASE_LOAN_REQ = '1' AND B.MORT_TYPE IN ('30016001','30016002') AND B.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI='1' </when> <when test ="mortageType==2"> AND B.CASE_LOAN_REQ = '1' AND B.MORT_TYPE IN ('30016003') AND B.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI='1' </when> <when test ="mortageType==3"> AND B.CASE_LOAN_REQ = '1' AND B.MORT_TYPE IN ('30016001','30016002') AND B.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI='0' </when> </choose>
